methods.name: authTarget
methods.doc:
Query whether current user has the specific privilege to the target, the target may be an app name or an ip address, or other destination.

This method will use return value to represent whether user has the specific privileges to the target, but to throw a RuntimeException to represent no auth is also a good way.

@param target the target to check @param privilegeType the privilege type to check @return if current user has the specific privileges to the target, return true, otherwise return false.

methods.name: isSuperUser
methods.doc:
Check whether current user is a super-user.

 @return if current user is super user return true, else return false.

methods.name: getNickName
methods.doc:
Get current user's nick name.

 @return current user's nick name.

methods.name: getLoginName
methods.doc:
Get current user's login name.

 @return current user's login name.

methods.name: getId
methods.doc:
Get current user's ID.

 @return ID of current user
